title: Where can I check the credentials of a historic coin that seems to be very old? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have already answered a similar question here on Quora. Hope that may be of any help to you. Here is the link to that answer. I have a few ancient coins and I am not aware of their origin and worth. Can anyone tell me a way where I can at least know the period where they belong to?
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Shiv Kumar Chakarvarti
